alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 9:42PM CST until March 01 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Colbert County in northwestern Alabama... Franklin County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 1015 PM CST. * At 942 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tishomingo State Park to near Fairview to near Evergreen, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russellville, Red Bay, Phil Campbell, Littleville, Belgreen, Vina, Hodges, Atwood, La Grange and Tharptown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for north central and northwestern Alabama.
